name: @deltares/fews-pi-requests
description: Library for making requests to the FEWS PI webservice

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && webpack
scripts.json2ts-pi: curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_history_edits.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%" > src/response/timeseries/HistoryEditsResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_flag_sources.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/flags/TimeSeriesFlagSourcesResponse.ts &  curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_flags.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/flags/TimeSeriesFlagsResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_flag_sources.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/flags/TimeSeriesFlagSourcesResponse.ts &  curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_flags.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/flags/TimeSeriesFlagsResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_displaygroups_nodes.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/displaygroups/DisplayGroupsNodesResponse.ts &  curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_weboc_configuration.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/configuration/WebOcConfigurationResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_importstatus.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/importStatus/importStatusResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_timeseries.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/timeseries/timeSeriesResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_parameters.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/timeseriesparameters/timeSeriesParametersResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_actions.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/actions/actionsResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_topology_nodes.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/topology/topologyNodeResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_locations.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/locations/locationsResponse.ts
scripts.json2ts-archive: curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_archive_areas.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/archivearea/ArchiveAreasResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_archive_attributes.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/archiveattributes/ArchiveAttributesResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_archive_externalnetcdfstorageforecasts.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/archivenetcdfstorageforecasts/ArchiveExternalNetCdfStorageForecastsResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_archive_locations.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/archivelocations/ArchiveLocationsResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_archive_parameters.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/archiveparameters/ArchiveParametersResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_archive_productsmetadata.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/archiveproductsmetadata/ArchiveProductsMetaDataResponse.ts & curl %npm_package_config_url%/pi_rest_archive_sources.json | json2ts --bannerComment "%npm_package_config_message%"  > src/response/archivesources/ArchiveSourcesResponse.ts
